id.description: Unique identifier for this office in the API system

name.description: Name of the location where the office is situated

primary_contact_user_id.description: User ID of the primary contact person for this office

parent_id.description: ID of the parent office, if this office is a branch office

parent_office_external_id.description: External ID of the parent office in the external system

child_ids.description: IDs of child offices associated with this office

child_office_external_ids.description: External IDs of child offices associated with this office

external_id.description: Unique identifier for this office in the external system
